reviews.review: Özelliklerde indirimdeyken kaçırmayın derim ucuz ve kaliteli yapım
Perfect game, puzzles are hard but not impossible, great humor, level creator, co-op. Its got it all.
Отличная игра если хочешь убить пару часов а то и дней своего времени!

Es un juego bastante bueno con una historia por detrás que te dejara intrigado y con ganas de seguir jugando.
Sus puzzles son buenos y con una complejidad aceptable para que sea entretenido y no se vuelva tedioso, el modo cooperativo es bueno, ideal para jugar con un amigo.

Jugue a Portal y Portal 2 y sin dudas es de los mejores juegos que he jugado, la historia es excelente, con muchos detalles y los rompecabezas son extremadamente entretenidos, ojala salga un portal 3.
Muy entretenido para jugar con amigos y te saca de contexto de todos esos juegos casuales, esto te hace despertar neuronas, recomendadisimo :)
Awesome game to play in coop! The story is also amazing!
The award-winning sequel to the smash-hit Portal 1, Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games around. If you haven't played it, do yourself a favor and add it to your cart
one of the best single player games ever
One of my all time favorites. So much personality and clever game design. Its a shame Valve is unlikely to make anything that could compare
muito divertido jogar o coop nesse game

one of the few times the sequel is even better than the original. this is still up there in my favorite games of all time even years later. i love the humor and the puzzles are unique and challenging. highly recommend :^)
跟朋友一起解謎的好遊戲
Хорошая игра, как для совместной игры, так и для одиночной.
pretty epic had a fun time killing my friends
Really fun and satisfying puzzles. Enough challenge without frustration and online course making allows for infinite fun.
GLaDOS made me do this review
Un jeu avec un véritable mode coop !
El mejor juego de puzzle ever
Love this game, absolute favorite, absolutely recomend
The "Who Is The Smarter Brother" Simulator
fun to play co-op and fun to play by yourself good story.
It's Portal what else needs to be said?

This game is one my favourite and I would like to see another game in the series. Ever since I got the X-Box 360, I had Portal 2 with it.  
The lore/story of the game is facinating and open for your own imagination. Having support for the Workshop and modding aswell makes this game remain with an active cummunity. 
Furthermore I want to mention that the audio desing of this game is outstanding. I've never heard such an immersive soundtrack to an immersing gameplay experience. And the game is good for replayability, because you get better at it every time.
Lastly the game tries to explain its scientific setting. What does the Aperture equipment look like from inside? They got you covered with some promo investor videos from Cave Johnson too.
One thing more, there is some good writing in this game. It is serious due to being science orientated and has some humor every now and then. It's a good mix of both and the characters are pretty fledged out.
Good Game with friend kinda repeative Netural /
Well made, with some mind twisting puzzels

A classic puzzle game, and an experience in the Steam Community that one should absolutely take the time to play.

If I'm being vague, it's because this is for the Grand Prix.
sou burro dms para esse jogo
Muy divertido, te hace usar la cabeza.

Jogozão topzera. Comprei por recomendação de um amigo e não me arrependi. A campanha solo me surpreendeu, mais intensa do que eu esperava do jogo, e a campanha coop é muito boa. A maioria dos mapas da comunidade é um lixo, mas dá pra resgatar algumas pérolas lá.
Крутая игра для того что бы тупить с другом

"This next test involves the Aperture Science Aerial Faith Plate. It was part of an initiative to investigate how well test subjects could solve problems when they were catapulted into space. Results were highly informative: They could not. Good luck"
класс, но с русской озвучкой проблемы

Hands down best game of all time.
Also I want more max points in the 2019 Summer Grand Prix.

Portal 2 es un juego. Qué más quieres que te diga?


Los gráficos son buenos, la historia es interesante, el gameplay es único y entre otras cosas.
Pero, qué es lo más importante del juego? portales.

Necesitas llevar un cubo desde donde estás parado hasta la la casa de tu vecino, otro país, o incluso la luna? usa portales.
Quieres tomar algo del refrigerador, pero no quieres levantarte del sofá? usa portales.
Necesitas ayuda con algo de gran importancia a lo cual no le encuentras solución? No creo que los portales te salven de esta....

Pero, el punto es, que los portales son el núcleo del juego.  Y aunque nada de lo anterior tiene que ver con el gameplay en sí, sigue siendo divertido quitarle el puente a tu amigo mientras va sobre el.
Hablando de amigos (los cuales probablemente no tienes), diré 1 cosa y solo 1 sobre el modo cooperativo:

Gestos.

Le doy al juego un para nada aleatorio 9.6/10
Si a Valve aún le interesaran este tipo de juegos, se podría hacer algo bonito de ellos. Y si la personalización de los robots siguiera en pie y se corrigieran algunos bugs aquí y allá, seguro que llega a ser perfecto.
Makes the original look like the prototype it was. It's filled with a larger cast of characters vividly brought to life through brilliant writing and some of the best voice acting in video games.

świetna gra pomimo stworzenia pod wątek dwuosobowy  świetnie sie bawiłem też w solo.

Эта игра будет унижать вас за всё что вы делаете. Если вы не хотите чтобы игра вас унижала, то вы можете сделать ничего, потому что игра всё равно вас будет унижать.
Но игра не в коем случае не плохая, она интересная и забавная. Иногда даже заставляла нас с другом попотеть над головоломками.
В общем игра стоит того. =DDDDDDDD
